获取用户信息失败，请检查后再试: Failed to obtain user information. Please check and try again
租户信息更新成功: The tenant information is updated successfully
仅显示本级用户: Display Only Members of This Level of Organization
支持 Excel 文件，文件小于 10 M，下载: Support Excel files, files less than 10 M, download
允许对同名用户覆盖更新: Allows overwriting updates for users with the same name
勾选覆盖用户信息将会对数据源中存在、但文件中不存在的成员执行删除操作，请谨慎选择: If you select Overwrite user information, users that exist in the data source but do not exist in the file will be deleted. Exercise caution when selecting this option.
文件大小超出限制: The file size exceeds the limit
最多上传1个文件，如需更新，请先删除已上传文件: A maximum of one file can be uploaded. If you want to update the file, delete the uploaded file first
请选择文件再上传: Please select the file and upload it
文件大小超出限制，请重新上传: The file size is out of limit, please upload again
图片大小超出限制，请重新上传: Image size is out of limit, please re-upload
确定离开当前页？: Are you sure to leave the current page?
离开将会导致未保存的信息丢失: Leaving will result in the loss of unsaved information
至少包含一类字符: Must contain at least one type of character
至少包含一类连续性场景: Must contain at least one type of sequential scenario
首次登录强制修改密码: Force password change on first login
1.关闭后该数据的用户将无法通过账密登录: 1. After closing, users of this data will not be able to log in via account-password
2.关闭后，再次开启时，账密规则信息会重置: 2. After closing, account-password rule information will be reset when enabled again
查询参数(Query Parameters)：如/staffs？name=val: Query Parameters: such as /staffs?name=value, appear after ?, separated by &.
该内置字段，不支持修改: This built-in field cannot be modified
确认要删除吗？: Are you sure you want to delete?
该字段在用户信息里必须填写: This field must be filled in the user information
该字段在用户信息里可编辑: This field is editable in the user information
是否删除该枚举值？: Are you sure you want to delete this enumeration value?
该枚举值删除后，请为已引用的记录指定其他值：: After deleting this enumeration value, please specify another value for the records that referenced it:
该字段在不同用户信息里不能相同: This field must be unique across different user information
枚举类型字段不允许设置唯一性: Enumeration type fields cannot be set as unique
关闭后，存量账号有效期不变，新账号有效期永久。: After closing, the validity period for existing accounts remains unchanged, and new accounts will have permanent validity.
切换为该账号登录: Switch to this account for login
密码修改成功后需要进行重新登录: You need to re-login after the password is successfully changed
两次输入的密码不一致，请重新输入: The two passwords entered do not match, please re-enter
请填写正确的手机号: Please enter a valid mobile number
由3-32位字母、数字、连接符(-)字符组成，以字母开头: Consists of 3-32 letters, numbers, and hyphen (-) characters, starting with a letter
由1-32位字母、数字、下划线(_)、点(.)、减号(-)字符组成，以字母或数字: Consists of 1-32 letters, numbers, underscores (_), dots (.), and hyphens (-), starting with a letter or number
请输入正确的邮箱地址: Please enter a correct email address
请输入正确的手机号码: Please enter a correct mobile number
最多不得超过12个字符（6个汉字）: No more than 12 characters (6 Chinese characters)
由3-32位字母、数字、下划线(_)字符组成，以字母开头，字母或数字结尾: Consists of 3-32 letters, numbers, and underscores (_), starting with a letter and ending with a letter or number
请输入服务地址，需以 https/http 开头，不得以 / 结尾: Please enter the service address, which must start with https/http and not end with /
请输入路径，需以 / 开头: Please enter the path, which must start with /
由3-32位字母、数字、下划线(_)、减号(-)字符组成，以字母开头，字母或数字: Consists of 3-32 letters, numbers, underscores (_), and hyphens (-), starting with a letter and ending with a letter or number
请将一下回调地址填写到企业微信配置内：: Please fill in the following callback address into the WeChat Work configuration:
当前用户不支持修改密码: The current user cannot change the password
请输入邮箱以接收邮件重置密码链接: Receive a password reset link via email
返回上一级: Go back to the previous level
已发送密码重设邮件: Password reset email has been sent
请查看邮件并根据提示进行操作: Please check your email and follow the instructions
验证码不能少于8位: The CAPTCHA cannot be less than 8 characters
删除前必须停用该策略: The policy must be deactivated before deletion
删除后，目标租户的用户数据也会同步删除: After deletion, the user data of the target tenant will also be deleted synchronously
未登录自动冻结（冻结后用户无法登录）: no login automatically frozen (frozen users cannot log in)
删除该组织同时会删除其下用户与子组织，请谨慎操作: Deleting this organization will also delete its users and sub-organizations. Please proceed with caution
支持多种类、多平台异构数据源快速接入，助力全方位分析: Supports fast access to heterogeneous data sources of multiple types and platforms to facilitate all-round analysis
包含丰富图表组件，自由式拖拽布局轻松搞定仪表盘: With rich chart components, the freestyle drag-and-drop layout makes it easy to navigate the dashboard
快速指定与SQL齐飞, 入门与进阶方式任你挑选，满足多样化分析需求: Fast specification and SQL fly together, you can choose the entry and advanced way to meet the diverse analysis needs
若需切换数据源需要先对当前已选数据源进行重置操作: To switch data sources, reset the current one first
删除租户将导致以下数据被删除:: Deleting this tenant will delete the following data:
重置将导致以下数据被删除:: Resetting will delete the following data:
本租户分享给其他租户的数据：涉及: Data this tenant shared with other tenants involves:
分享给其他租户的数据：涉及: Data shared with other tenants involves:
其他租户分享至本租户的数据：涉及: Data shared from other tenants to this tenant involves:
关闭后用户将无法通过账密登录: After closing, users will not be able to log in via username/password
首次强制修改密码: Force password change on first login
确认要关闭企业微信登录吗？: Are you sure you want to disable WeChat Work login?
关闭后用户将无法通过企业微信登录: After deactivation, users will not be able to log in via WeChat Work
需要先配置数据源后才可进行登录配置，当前支持使用以下方式进行登录: You need to configure a data source before setting up login configurations, currently supports the following methods for logging in
仅对本地数据源启用: Enable only for local data source
账号陆续生效中，请以用户最终收到的邮件为准: Accounts are progressively taking effect, please refer to the final email received by the user
admin只能进入默认租户: Admin can only access the default tenant
需要先停用租户才能删除: Need to deactivate the tenant before deleting
确定停用当前租户？: Are you sure to deactivate the current tenant?
停用后，用户将无法看到该租户信息: Once deactivated, users will not be able to see this tenant
确定删除当前租户？: Are you sure you want to delete this tenant?
停用后，将不可使用管理员账号进行登录: After deactivation, the administrator account cannot be used for logging in
停用后，可使用管理员账号进行登录: After deactivation, the administrator account can still be used for logging in
当前还没有数据源，需要先选择数据源类型并进行配置: There is currently no data source; you need to select a data source type and configure it first
